title: Best of The Herd: 09/24/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 09/24/2019
description:
Colin actually agrees with Baker Mayfield that he will not panic but he's worried his owner might and that's the problem with being bad at the top of an organization. He compares Patrick Mahomes and the Chiefs to Steph Curry and the Warriors. This week's Herd Hierarchy sees one team lose but stay in the top 4. Plus, NBC's Peter King talks about the Packers and what the Browns need to do to turn their season around.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
